mapper.select: select * from basket_member where pro_num=#{pro_num, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and id=#{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into basket_member values (basket_seq.nextval, #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pro_num, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate, #{count})
mapper.update: update basket_member set count=count+#{count} where id=#{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and pro_num=#{pro_num, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete: delete from basket_member where id=#{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and pro_num=#{pro_num, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
